Generally speaking, if you find yourself in the water with sharks,...
...what you should do is sit back, relax, and enjoy the experience.
But sometimes, sharks can get aggressive.
A number of shark species will actually arch their back and drop their pectoral fins in a threat display.
To dodge a charging shark, you kinda have to act like a matador,...
...put your hands on top of its head and push it on by.
But honestly, your risk of getting charged by a shark, extremely low.
